short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Eliminate downloading of apps to watch anime or download anime to  laptop or desktop.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: KissAnime was an anime-focused file streaming webthat hosted links and embedded videos, allowing users to stream or download movies.
